title.1: The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14, one of our favorite gaming laptops, is $450 off
title.3: New GeForce RTX 3050 variant offers the same performance but lower power use
title.4: After more than 5 years, Nvidia’s GTX 1060 is no longer Steam’s most-used GPU
title.5: Two months of Intel Arc driver updates begin to fix low performance in old games

description.0: How did Nvidia fare over the past year? Strap yourself in tight, because the ride’s a bumpy one…
description.1: You can get one of the best values in PC gaming for $1,199.99 until December 9th. Plus more great deals today, like the 75-inch Vizio MQ7 TV, Amazon Echo speakers with free smart bulbs, the Lenovo Smart Clock, and more.
description.2: This slender gaming laptop from Asus iterates on the excellent previous model without needing to reinvent the wheel.
description.3: GA107 die has just the right number of CUDA cores for an RTX 3050.
description.4: Shortages and price increases have given the GTX 1060 an unusually long life.
description.5: Latest beta driver can boost speeds of some DirectX9 games by 50 to 80 percent.
